AUTO.error_auto_not_allowed_for_target: âŒ 'Ukufumanisa ngokuzenzekelayo' kuvunyelwe kuphela njengolwimi lomthombo, hayi njengolwimi olujolise kulo.

START.error_critical:
âŒ Kwenzeke impazamo ebucayi: {error}
Nceda uzame kwakhona okanye uqhagamshelane nenkxaso.
START.error_send_welcome: âŒ Impazamo ekuthumeleni umyalezo wamkelekileyo. Nceda uzame kwakhona okanye uqhagamshelane nenkxaso.
START.new_user_description: Molo {username}! Umguquleli wakho wakho ukulungele ukusebenzisa.
START.getting_started_value:
â€¢ Sebenzisa `/daily` ukufumana amaphuzu wemihla ngemihla
â€¢ Zama `/texttr` ngeenguqulelo zakho zokuqala
â€¢ Jonga `/shop` ukuze ufumane uphuculo lwamkaxaka
â€¢ Sebenzisa `/help` ukufumana iinkcukacha zemiyalelo
START.admin_tips_value:
â€¢ Sebenzisa `/setchannel` ukunciphisa iinguqulelo kwiziteshi okanye iilwimi ezithile
â€¢ Sebenzisa `/invite` ukongeza uMuse kwiiseva ezininzi
â€¢ Sebenzisa `/help` ukufumana yonke imiyalelo
START.voice_commands_value:
`/voicechat [source] [target]` - Uguqulelo lwezwi ngexesha lokwenyani
`/voicechat2 [lang1] [lang2]` - Uguqulelo oluphuculweyo lweendlela ezimbini
`/voice [text] [source] [target]` - Uguqulelo lombhalo uye kwilizwi
`/speak [text] [source] [target]` - Guqula kwaye udlale kwisiteshi sezwi
START.text_commands_value:
`/texttr [text] [source] [target]` - Guqula umbhalo
`/autotranslate [source] [target]` - Guqula ngokuzenzekelayo yonke imiyalezo yakho
`/read [message_id] [target]` - Guqula nawuphi na umyalezo othunyelweyo nge-ID
`/dmtr [user] [text] [source] [target]` - Thumela i-DM eguquliwe
START.achievements_value:
`/achievements` - Jonga inkqubela yakho yeempumelelo
`/rewards` - Jonga amaphuzu kunye nenqanaba lakho
`/cashout` - Guqula amaphuzu eempumelelo abe ngamaphuzu okusebenza
`/daily` - Fumana amaphuzu wemihla ngemihla
`/shop` - Khangela ivenkile yamaphuzu
`/buy [item]` - Thenga izinto kwiivenkile
`/buypoints [amount]` - Thenga amaphuzu ongezelelweyo
`/gift [amount]` - Nikezela abahlobo bakho ngamaphuzu
`/profile` - Jonga iprofayili yakho
`/leaderboard` - Jonga abasebenzisi abangaphezulu
`/transactions` - Jonga imbali yamaphulo amaphuzu
START.settings_value:
`/hide` okanye `/show` - Tshintsha ukubonakala kombhalo wokuqala
`/preferences` - Lungisa izinto ozithandayo zolwimi
`/history` - Jonga imbali yeenguqulelo
`/list` - Jonga zonke iilwimi ezixhaswayo
`/upgrade` - Vula iinketho eziphezulu
`/help` - Uluhlu lwemiyalelo epheleleyo
`/stop` - Yeka iseshoni yenguqulelo
START.community_value:
`/feedback` - Linganisa kwaye ubuyekeze uMuse (fumana amaphuzu!)
`/reviews` - Jonga amagqabantshintshi abasebenzisi
`/invite` - Yabelana ngoMuse nabahlobo (fumana amaphuzu!)
`/vote` - Xhasa i-bot kwiisayithi zokuloba ibhot (fumana amaphuzu!)
START.upgrade_benefits_value:
ğŸ¥‰ **Basic ($1/ngenyanga):** 500 iimpawu, 1h izwi, ukufikelela kwimbali
ğŸ¥ˆ **Premium ($3/ngenyanga):** 2000 iimpawu, 2h izwi, inkqubo ephambili
ğŸ¥‡ **Pro ($5/ngenyanga):** Akukho mda + iimpawu zovavanyo
START.premium_active_value:
â€¢ Imida ephuculweyo: {text_limit} iimpawu
â€¢ Ixesha lezwi: {voice_limit} imizuzu
â€¢ Isixa samaphuzu: {multiplier}
â€¢ Enkosi ngokuxhasa uMuse! ğŸ’–
START.language_format_value:
Ungasebenzisa amagama okanye amakhodi olwimi:
â€¢ Amagama: `English`, `Spanish`, `Japanese`
â€¢ Amakhodi: `en`, `es`, `ja`
â€¢ Umzekelo: `/texttr text:'Hello World' source_lang:English target_lang:Spanish`

START.footer_dm: Imowudi Yomsebenzisi: Ilungele ii-DMs | Joyina iseva yethu yoncedo: discord.gg/VMpBsbhrff

LIST.title: Iilwimi ezikhoyo zoguqulelo
LIST.description: Nantsi yonke imizekelo yeelwimi onokuzisebenzisa nomguquli:

HELP.title: ğŸ¤– Muse Translator - Uluhlu LwemiSebenzi
HELP.reward_value:
`/daily` - Fumana umvuzo wakho wemihla ngemihla
`/shop` - Jonga ivenkile yemivuzo
`/buy [umvuzo]` - Thenga imivuzo usebenzisa amanqaku
`/profile [umsebenzisi]` - Jonga iprofayili yakho nezibalo
`/rewards` - Jonga imivuzo esebenzayo
`/gift [umsebenzisi] [isixa]` - Nika abanye amanqaku
HELP.social_value:
`/leaderboard` - Jonga abantu abanamanqaku aphezulu
`/achievements` - Jonga iimpumelelo neebheji
`/cashout` - Guqula amanqaku eemfuno kwi `/shop`
`/transactions` - Jonga imbali yokurhweba kwamanqaku akho
HELP.setup_value_user: `/stop` - Yeka naluphi na uhlobo lokuguqulela olusebenzayo
HELP.setup_value_admin:
`/setchannel [ikhonkco_lwentsimi]` - Misela isiteshi soguqulelo kunye neemvume zolwimi
`/stop` - Yeka naluphi na uhlobo lokuguqulela olusebenzayo
HELP.settings_value:
`/hide` - Fihla umyalezo wokuqala kwiinguqulelo
`/show` - Bonisa umyalezo wokuqala kwiinguqulelo
`/preferences` - Lungisa iilwimi zakho ozithandayo
`/history` - Jonga imbali yoguqulelo lwakho
HELP.info_value:
`/list` - Jonga zonke iilwimi ezixhaswayo
`/upgrade` - Jonga iindlela eziphuculweyo
`/invite` - Fumana amakhonkco okumenywa kwebhoti
`/vote` - Fumana amakhonkco okuvota ngebhoti
`/help` - Bonisa olu luhlu lwemiyalelo
HELP.readimage_value: `/readimage [ulwimi_olujolise_kulo]` - Khipha kwaye uguqulele umbhalo kwimifanekiso usebenzisa i-OCR
HELP.context_value: `Cofa ekunene kumyalezo â†’ IiApps â†’ Funda Umyalezo` - Guqulela naliphi na iqela lombhalo
HELP.tips_value:
â€¢ Sebenzisa `auto` ukufumanisa ulwimi ngokuzenzekelayo
â€¢ Ikhowudi yolwimi: `en`, `es`, `fr` okanye amagama: English, Spanish, French
â€¢ Fumana amanqaku mihla ngemihla kwaye uthenge amalungelo okusebenzisa okwexeshana!
â€¢ Umzekelo: `/texttr text:'hola' source_lang:es target_lang:en`
HELP.footer_server: Imowudi yeServer: {server} | Zonke iimpawu ziyafumaneka | Sebenzisa `/daily` ukufumana amanqaku!
HELP.footer_dm: Imowudi yoMsebenzisi: Eyona ilungileyo kwi-DMs | Ezinye iimpawu zikhona kuphela kwi-server | Sebenzisa `/daily` ukufumana amanqaku!
